languages.text: Пираты разорили колонию, убив или захватив в плен часть трудоспособного населения. На восстановление мира потребуется время.

traits.locale_text: Пираты разорили колонию, убив или захватив в плен часть трудоспособного населения. На восстановление мира потребуется время.

languages.text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
languages.original_text: Пираты разорили колонию, убив или захватив в плен часть трудоспособного населения. На восстановление мира потребуется время.

traits.locale_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most of the able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most of the able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

languages.text: 海盗对殖民地造成了严重破坏，他们杀害、俘虏了绝大部分身体健康的居民。殖民地恐怕要过段时间才能从灾难中恢复过来。
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

traits.locale_text: 海盗对殖民地造成了严重破坏，他们杀害、俘虏了绝大部分身体健康的居民。殖民地恐怕要过段时间才能从灾难中恢复过来。

languages.text: Los piratas han devastado la colonia, matando y capturando a la mayoría de colonos sanos. Restaurarla llevará tiempo.
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

traits.locale_text: Los piratas han devastado la colonia, matando y capturando a la mayoría de colonos sanos. Restaurarla llevará tiempo.

languages.text: 海賊によってコロニーは壊滅的な打撃を受け、健全なコロニー住民のほとんどが殺されるか捕らえられた。コロニーの修復には時間がかかるだろう。
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

traits.locale_text: 海賊によってコロニーは壊滅的な打撃を受け、健全なコロニー住民のほとんどが殺されるか捕らえられた。コロニーの修復には時間がかかるだろう。

languages.text: Piraten sind gnadenlos über die Kolonie hergefallen und haben die meisten gesunden Kolonisten getötet oder verschleppt. Es wird dauern, die Kolonie wieder aufzubauen.
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

traits.locale_text: Piraten sind gnadenlos über die Kolonie hergefallen und haben die meisten gesunden Kolonisten getötet oder verschleppt. Es wird dauern, die Kolonie wieder aufzubauen.

languages.text: Des pirates ont dévasté la colonie, tuant ou capturant tous les colons valides. La restauration de la colonie prendra du temps.
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.

traits.locale_text: Des pirates ont dévasté la colonie, tuant ou capturant tous les colons valides. La restauration de la colonie prendra du temps.

languages.text: Korsanlar, eli iş tutan kolonicilerin çoğunu öldürüp esir alarak koloniyi yerle bir etti. Koloninin tekrar kurulması zaman alacaktır.
languages.original_text: Pirates have devastated the colony, killing or capturing most able-bodied colonists. Restoring the colony will take time.
